name: element: navbar
func:
// Set menu html var dataExists = global.get("webData") !== null && global.get("webData") !== undefined; var currentRunExists = global.get("runHistory", "storeInFile") !== null && global.get("runHistory", "storeInFile") !== undefined && ( Array.isArray(global.get("runHistory", "storeInFile")) ? !(global.get("runHistory", "storeInFile")[(global.get("runHistory", "storeInFile")).length - 1]).isFinalized : !(global.get("runHistory", "storeInFile")).isFinalized); var currentRun = currentRunExists ? Array.isArray(global.get("runHistory", "storeInFile")) ? global.get("runHistory", "storeInFile")[(global.get("runHistory", "storeInFile")).length - 1] : global.get("runHistory", "storeInFile") : null; const receiptsAwaiting = currentRunExists ? !currentRun.allReceiptsProcessed : false; const isBeingProcessed = currentRunExists ? !currentRun.isFinalized : false; function isActive(pageName) { return (msg.payload.webSettings.state.activePage == pageName); } function pageAccepted(pageName) { return (msg.payload.webSettings.acceptances[pageName]); } var html = `
  • Start
  • Loginoplysninger
  • Forretningsregler
  • Tilskudssatser
    • `; var receiptCount = 0; if (global.get("webData") !== undefined) if (global.get("webData")["citizens-actions"] !== undefined) receiptCount += global.get("webData")["citizens-actions"].length; if (global.get("webData") !== undefined) if (global.get("webData")["citizens-noactions"] !== undefined) receiptCount += global.get("webData")["citizens-noactions"].length; if (msg.payload.webSettings.state.isRunning ) html += `
  • ` + `Robotten k√∏rer` + `
    • `; else if ((isBeingProcessed && !dataExists) || (receiptsAwaiting && receiptCount == 0)) html += `
  • Genoptag k√∏rsel
    • `; else if (receiptsAwaiting && isBeingProcessed) html += `
  • Anbefalede handlinger
    • ` + `
  • Borgere uden bevilling
    • `; else if (!receiptsAwaiting && isBeingProcessed) html += `
  • Anbefalede handlinger
    • ` + `
  • Borgere uden bevilling
    • ` + `
  • Afslut k√∏rsel
    • `; else if (pageAccepted('login') && pageAccepted('rules') && pageAccepted('grants')) html += `
  • ` + (msg.payload.webSettings.state.isRunning ? `Robotten k√∏rer` : `Ny k√∏rsel`) + `
    • `; /* (receiptsAwaiting && isBeingProcessed ? (`
  • Anbefalede handlinger
    • `) + (`
  • Ej berettigede borgere
    • `) : ``) + ((isBeingProcessed && !dataExists) ? `
  • Genoptag k√∏rsel
    • ` : ((!receiptsAwaiting && isBeingProcessed) ? `
  • Afslut k√∏rsel
    • ` : ((pageAccepted('login') && pageAccepted('rules') && pageAccepted('grants')) ? `
  • `+ (msg.payload.webSettings.state.isRunning ? `Robotten k√∏rer` : `Ny k√∏rsel`) +`
    • ` : ``)) ) */ html += `
`; msg.payload.pageElements['navbar'] = html; return msg;

name: [E] Find ny start- og slutdato ud fra seneste k√∏rsel samt dags dato

info:
## Copy grant info
This change node copies the grant set from the payload into the msg object as msg.tilskudsInfo.

name: Find filnavn
info:
## Define file name
This JS snippet utilizes the JavaScript date function `toDateString()` as well as some string manipulation to define the name of the JSON file which will be downloaded from Worklet web interface.

The name defined is later used to find and read the downloaded file, as the actual file name cannot be set when downloading, nor can it be retrieved as the download is in progress. Therefore, the name must be determined manually to match the naming procedure of Worklet web interface.

name: Find uafsluttet k√∏rsel eller skab ny
Findes filen?
info:
## Check for file
This JS snippet utilizes global modules `FS` and `Path` to check if the receipt JSON file already exists, or needs to be downloaded.

## Check for file - switch
This switch, which succeeds the JS snippet which determines receipt file existance, is used to skip the download of receipts if they already exist (they shouldn't!).

name: Slet JSON fil
info:
## Delete JSON file

This JS snippet utilizes the FS module to delete the JSON file after it has been read to memory.

name: S√¶t msg.receipts
info:
## Set msg.receipts

This change node sets msg.receipts = payload.kvitteringer (which contains an array of receipts), and deletes the payload afterwards.

name: S√¶t selectors
info:
## S√¶t referencer

In this change node, CSS selectors for Worklet web interface (https://workletnew.snapp.dk/) are set for use in the PupController JSON file.

name: Set pup commands

rules.to: [	    {	        "action": "launch",	        "parameters":	        {	            "headless": true,	            "slowMo": 50,	            "ignoreHTTPSErrors": true,	            "defaultViewport": null	        }	    },		    {	        "action": "goto",	        "url": selectors.worklet.url	    },		    {	        "action": "wait",	        "ms": 10000	    },	    	    {	        "action": "type",	        "path": selectors.worklet.loginUser,	        "input": workletUser	    },		    {	        "action": "type",	        "path": selectors.worklet.loginPass,	        "input": workletPass	    },	    	    {	        "action": "click",	        "path": selectors.worklet.loginButton	    },		    {	        "action": "click",	        "path": selectors.worklet.datePickerFrom	    },		    {	        "action": "type",	        "path": selectors.worklet.datePickerActive,	        "input": currentRun.startDate,	        "clear": true	    },		    {	        "action": "click",	        "path": selectors.worklet.header	    },		    {	        "action": "click",	        "path": selectors.worklet.datePickerTo	    },		    {	        "action": "type",	        "path": selectors.worklet.datePickerActive,	        "input": currentRun.endDate,	        "clear": true	    },		    {	        "action": "click",	        "path": selectors.worklet.header	    },		    {	        "action": "click",	        "isDownload": true,	        "path": selectors.worklet.downloadButton	    },	    {	        "action": "close"	    }	    	]

info:
## Set pup commands

This change node sets the automation flow JSON needed in PupController API. The flow is hard-coded with variable references to the CSS selectors defined in the preceeding node.

Find borgere som ikke har en sag / bevilling

name: Flyt borgere som ikke har handlinger til "errors"
Fratr√¶k ydelsesbestemt till√¶g fra Danmark (type B + Danmark 1/2)

rules.to: $.payload ~> |$.handlinger|(		$uid := uid;	$behandling := $$.payload.faktura.behandlinger[uid = $uid];	$fid := $behandling.fid;	$faktura := $$.payload.faktura[id = $fid];	$borger := $$.payload[cpr = $faktura.patientCPR];	$danmark := $borger.persondata.danmarkgruppe;		$danmarkSats := $$.tilskudsInfo.tilskudsperioder.satser[wtitel = $behandling.titel];	$danmarkProcent := tilskud * ($danmarkSats.tilskud_procent / 100);	$danmarkMax := $danmarkSats.tilskud_maxdkk;		$danmarkTilskud := $danmarkProcent > $danmarkMax ? $danmarkMax : $danmarkProcent;			    $behandling.type = "B"	and ($danmark = 1 or $danmark = 2) ?	{	    	    "tilskud": tilskud - ($danmarkProcent > $danmarkMax ? $danmarkMax : $danmarkProcent),	    "beregning": beregning & " -" & ($danmarkProcent > $danmarkMax ? $danmarkMax : $danmarkProcent) & " (Danmark)"	    	}		)|

info: https://try.jsonata.org/re36DEF4i

name: Fratr√¶k 50% (maks 100) ved type A + Danmark 1/2

rules.to: $.payload ~> |$.handlinger|(		$uid := uid;	$behandling := $$.payload.faktura.behandlinger[uid = $uid];	$fid := $behandling.fid;	$faktura := $$.payload.faktura[id = $fid];	$borger := $$.payload[cpr = $faktura.patientCPR];	$danmark := $borger.persondata.danmarkgruppe;		$tilskud_maxdkk := $$.tilskudsInfo.danmark_fratraek_maxdkk;	$tilskud_procent := $$.tilskudsInfo.danmark_fratraek_procent;	$danmarkProcent := tilskud * ($tilskud_procent / 100);	$danmarkMax := $tilskud_maxdkk;		$danmarkTilskud := $danmarkProcent > $danmarkMax ? $danmarkMax : $danmarkProcent;			    $behandling.type = "A"	and ($danmark = 1 or $danmark = 2) ?	{		    "tilskud": tilskud - ($danmarkProcent > $danmarkMax ? $danmarkMax : $danmarkProcent),	    "beregning": beregning & " -" & ($danmarkProcent > $danmarkMax ? $danmarkMax : $danmarkProcent) & " (Danmark)"	    	}		)|			/*and ($faktura.ydernummer != "ydernummermangler" and $faktura.ydernummer != null) ?*/

info: Hvis fodterapeut har ydernr (er statsautoriseret) og behandlingen er udf√∏rt i Danmark, og borger er gruppe 1 og 2, fratr√¶kkes et ydelsesbestemt tilskud p√• 50% fra Danmark (maks. 100 kr).

name: Begr√¶ns tilskud der overstiger prisgr√¶nse ved type A + uautoriseret type B

rules.to: $.payload ~> |$.handlinger|(		$uid := uid;	$behandling := $$.payload.faktura.behandlinger[uid = $uid];	$fid := $behandling.fid;	$faktura := $$.payload.faktura[id = $fid];	$borger := $$.payload[cpr = $faktura.patientCPR];	$danmark := $borger.persondata.danmarkgruppe;		$tilskud_max_hjemme := $$.tilskudsInfo.max_hjemmebehandling;	$tilskud_max_ude := $$.tilskudsInfo.max_udekoersel;		    $behandling.type = "A" 	or	        ($behandling.type = "B"	    and ($faktura.ydernummer != "ydernummermangler" and $faktura.ydernummer != null)) ?	{		    "tilskud": (titel = "Behandlingipatientsegethjem") ?	                    (tilskud > $tilskud_max_hjemme ? $tilskud_max_hjemme : tilskud)	                    :	                    (tilskud > $tilskud_max_ude ? $tilskud_max_ude : tilskud),	    "beregning": beregning & " = overstiger takst, derfor nedsat til " & tilskud	    	}		)|

info: https://try.jsonata.org/re36DEF4i

name: Gang med till√¶gsprocent
info: https://try.jsonata.org/re36DEF4i

# Get Settings/Rules/Grants

Gets (or sets) the current ruleset from global context and stores it in the msg object.
If no existing data is found, new data is created from templates which are found inside the subflow itself.

Subflow was originially intended to only load a single element into the payload, however to speed up development,
all three elements were merged into a single subflow. This means that the subflow is heavily referenced and loads
unneccessary data in multiple occasions.

name: Clean alt un√∏dvendig data fra msg objekt

rules.to: $.runHistory~> |$|(		$startDate := currentRun.startDate;	$endDate := currentRun.endDate;		startDate = $startDate and endDate = $endDate ?	{		    "processedReceipts": currentRun.processedReceipts	    	}		)|

name: Kontrol om alle fakturaer er arkiveret
Check if all is archived
[E] Download fakturaer for den bestemte tidsperiode

info:
## Set global.runHistory
Sets an empty list in global context stored in file.

## Get runHistory switch
Checks if there is a run history stored in memory (in global context).

name: get runHistory
info:
## get runHistory
Copies the run history stored in file to msg.runHistory.

## Custom deployment date
This change node defines the starting date for a run, if no runs are found in the run history.
It is used for testing, as well as for running the flow for the first time after deployment.

rules.to: (	    $startDate := currentRun.startDate;	    $endDate := currentRun.endDate;		    (runHistory[startDate = $startDate and endDate = $endDate] ~> $exists()) = false ?		    $append(runHistory, currentRun)	    :	    runHistory	)
$.runHistory~> |$|(		$startDate := currentRun.startDate;	$endDate := currentRun.endDate;		startDate = $startDate and endDate = $endDate ?	{		    "isFinalized": true	    	}		)|

This JS snippet utilizes global modules `FS` and `Path` to check if the receipt JSON file already exists, or needs to be downloaded.

rules.to: $.payload ~> |$.persondata|(		$tillaegsprocent_split := personligtillaegsprocent	    ~> $replace("Personlig till√¶gsprocent\tGyldig fra\tGyldig til\tAjourf√∏ringsdato\n", "")	    ~> $split("\n");	{		"personligtillaegsprocent": $tillaegsprocent_split #$i .{		    "dato_fra": ($tillaegsprocent_split[$i]	        ~> $split("\t"))[1]	        ~> $toMillis('[D01]-[M01]-[Y0001]')	        ~> $fromMillis('[Y0001]-[M01]-[D01]'),		    "dato_til": ($tillaegsprocent_split[$i]	        ~> $split("\t"))[2]	        ~> $toMillis('[D01]-[M01]-[Y0001]')	        ~> $fromMillis('[Y0001]-[M01]-[D01]'),		    "tillaegsprocent": ($t := (($tillaegsprocent_split[$i]	        ~> $split("\t"))[0]	        ~> $replace("%", "")	        ~> $replace("Ingen resultater fundet", "0"));	          ($t = "" ? 0 : $number($t)))	    }		}	)|

name: Sager

rules.to: $.payload ~> |$.persondata|(		$sager_split := sager	    ~> $replace("\n", "")	    ~> $replace("\t\t", "\t")	    ~> $substringAfter("\t")	    ~> $split("\t");	{	    "sager": $sager_split #$i .(		        /* Hvis kolonne-antal √¶ndrer sig, breaker denne kode */		        $i % 5 = 0 and $i != 0 ?	        {	            "titel": $sager_split[$i],	            	            "type": $sager_split[$i+1],		            "fra": $sager_split[$i+2]	                ~> $toMillis('[D01]-[M01]-[Y0001]')	                ~> $fromMillis('[Y0001]-[M01]-[D01]'),		            "til": $til := ($sager_split[$i+3]	                ~> $toMillis('[D01]-[M01]-[Y0001]')	                ~> $fromMillis('[Y0001]-[M01]-[D01]')),		            "aktiv": ($til ~> $boolean()) ? ( $til ~> $toMillis() > $millis() ? true : false ) : true,		            "bevilling": ($sager_split[$i+4] = "Bevilget")	        })		    }	)|

name: Kontroller KP data ud fra regels√¶t

rules.to: payload @$p.	(	$respectsRule := function($rule, $value)	{	    $rule.operator = "!null" ?	        $value != null	    :	    $value = null ?	        false	    :	    $rule.operator = "<" ?	        $value < $rule.value	    :	    $rule.operator = ">" ?	        $value > $rule.value	    :	    $rule.operator = "==" ?	        $value = $rule.value	    :	    $rule.operator = "!=" ?	        $value != $rule.value	    :	    $rule.operator = "contains" ?	        ($contains($string($rule.value), $string($value)))	    :	    $rule.operator = "!contains" ?	        ($contains($string($rule.value), $string($value)) ? false : true)	};	{	    "cpr": $p.cpr,	    "persondata": $p.persondata,	    "faktura": $p.faktura,		    "regelbrud":	        rules @$r.	        (	            $respectsRule($r, $data := $lookup($p.persondata, $r.variable)) = false ?	            {	                "rule": $r.name,	                "description": $r.description,	                "objectValue": $data,	                "operator": $r.operator,	                "expectedValue": $r.value,	                "isRespected": $respectsRule($r, $data)	            }	        )	}	)

name: Fjern borgere som ikke er berettiget
Find bevilling + sag g√¶ldende for hver behandling

rules.to: $.payload ~> | $.faktura.behandlinger |	(		    $uid := uid;	    $fid := fid;	    $faktura := $$.payload.faktura[id = $fid];	    $borger := $$.payload[cpr = $faktura.patientCPR];	    $type := type;		{	    "bevilget": type = 'A' ?	                    ($borger.persondata.bevilling ?	                        true : $borger.persondata.sager	                                [   	                                    titel ~> $lowercase ~> $contains("fod")	                                and	                                    (type ~> $lowercase ~> $contains("udvidet helbredstill"))	                                and	                                    ($faktura.dato ~> $toMillis) > (fra ~> $toMillis)	                                and	                                    (til ? ($faktura.dato ~> $toMillis) < (til ~> $toMillis) : true)	                                and	                                    bevilling = true	                                ]	                                    ~> $exists ? true : false)	                :	                    ($borger.persondata.sager	                        [	                            (type ~> $lowercase ~> $contains("almindeligt helbred")	                        or	                            type ~> $lowercase ~> $contains("gskort"))	                        and	                            ($faktura.dato ~> $toMillis) > (fra ~> $toMillis)	                        and	                            (til ? ($faktura.dato ~> $toMillis) < (til ~> $toMillis) : true)	                        and	                            bevilling = true	                        ]	                            ~> $exists ? true : false),	                                	    "sag": $borger.persondata.sager	                [	                    titel ~> $lowercase ~> $contains("fod")	                and	                    ($type = 'A' ?	                        (type ~> $lowercase ~> $contains("udvidet helbred"))	                    :	                        (type ~> $lowercase ~> $contains("almindeligt helbredstill")	                    or	                        type ~> $lowercase ~> $contains("gskort")))	                and	                    ($faktura.dato ~> $toMillis) > (fra ~> $toMillis)	                and	                    (til ? ($faktura.dato ~> $toMillis) < (til ~> $toMillis) : true)	                and	                    bevilling = true	                ]		})|

name: Find relevant data for hver behandling p√• faktura
Find till√¶gsprocent g√¶ldende for hver faktura

rules.to: $.payload ~> | $.faktura |	(		    $id := id;	    /*$borger := $$.payload[faktura.id = $id];*/	    $borger := $$.payload[$id in faktura.id];	    $dato := dato;		{		    "_personligtillaegsprocent": $borger.persondata.personligtillaegsprocent [	        ($dato ~> $toMillis) > (dato_fra ~> $toMillis)	    and	        (dato_til ~> $boolean ? (($dato ~> $toMillis) < (dato_til ~> $toMillis)) : true)	    ],		    "_helbredstillaegsprocent": $borger.persondata.helbredstillaegsprocent [	        ($dato ~> $toMillis) > (dato_fra ~> $toMillis)	    and	        (dato_til ~> $boolean ? (($dato ~> $toMillis) < (dato_til ~> $toMillis)) : true)	    ]		})|

name: Find relevant data for hver faktura
Danmark

rules.to: receipts @$r.	(	    payload[cpr = $r.patientCPR] ~> $exists() = false ?	    {	        "cpr": $r.patientCPR,	        "faktura": $r,	        "regelbrud": "Borger-data blev ikke indsamlet korrekt"	    }	)
